Description: Year 2008, but I bought it new in the store in 2009. Pretty rare model, despite the fact that the serial. Issued rather small circulation.Very good condition of guitar. Only little scratches, and one horn chip on the guitar body, you can see it on last photo. Guitar neck is straight.Tone and volume potenciometers sounds good, not rustling, because I lubricated it periodically.Rockfield humbuckers sounds really good. At one time I used a set of EMG 81-85 pickups, but then I went back to Rockfield, because I liked their sound much more.I used Floyd Rose only for the first 2-3 years, then I realized that I didn't need him, and blocked it. Now, before selling it, I unlocked and tuned it again. varnish glitters almost like new. There is a set of good new strings Elixir 10-46 Construction: bolt onBody wood: natoTop style: bevel topTuners: B.C. Rich® die-castFretboard: ebonyFrets: 24 jumboScale: 24 5/8"Special Features: Pearl White body and headstock, silver metallic bevels and special lightning white pearl fretboard inlayBridge: Floyd Rose original tremoloPickups: Two black Rockfield® Mafia humbuckersControls: 1 volume, 1 three-way toggle and 1 tone I SHIP WORLDWIDE!
